name: Black Diamond Distance Carbon Z Poles - Unisex
description: Black Diamond's lightest Z-Poles are made for endurance runners, fast-packers and adventure trekkers. Carbon fibre construction and fixed length design keeps them sturdy without excess weight.Lightweight EVA grips with mini-extensions that let you choke up the shafts on steep terrain.3 sections fold Z-style for easy carrying. Speed cones make reassembly fast and easy.Included interchangeable, non-scarring rubber Tech Tips and carbide Tech Tips.Stopper baskets with shaft catchers secure folded sections for easy packing.
